name: Reversinglabs A1000 v2
description: App integrates with ReversingLabs A1000 Malware Analysis Appliance APIs

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
actions.verbose: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration.
Upload file to A1000.

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to detonate
vault_id.name: vault_id

actions.verbose: Detonate file from url.

file_url.description: URL from which the appliance should download the data
file_url.name: file_url

archive_password.description: Password, if file is a password-protected archive
archive_password.name: archive_password

actions.verbose: Check submitted url status. Returns report if ready.
Initiate pdf report creation.
Check pdf report creation status.
Download pdf report.

Accepts a single hash string and gets the full TitaniumCore static analysis report for the requested sample.The requested sample must be present on the appliance. If the optional fields parameter is not provided in the request, all available parts of the static analysis report are returned in the response.
Queries URL info.
Queries domain info.
Queries IP info.

actions.description: Get a list of IP-to-domain mappings
actions.verbose: Accepts an IP address string and returns a list of IP-to-domain mappings.

actions.description: Get a list of URLs hosted on the requested IP address
actions.verbose: Accepts an IP address string and returns a list of URLs hosted on the requested IP address.

actions.description: Get a a list of hashes and classifications for files found on the requested IP address
actions.verbose: Accepts an IP address string and returns a list of hashes and classifications for files found on the requested IP address.

actions.description: Search for samples using multi-part search criteria
actions.verbose: Search for samples available on the local A1000 instance and TitaniumCloud using the Advanced Search capabilities.

actions.description: Initiate the creation of dynamic analysis PDF report
actions.verbose: Accepts a single hash string and and a report format and initiates the creation of PDF or HTML reports for samples that have gone through dynamic analysis in the ReversingLabs Cloud Sandbox.

actions.description: Get status of the report previously requested
actions.verbose: Accepts a single hash string and report format parameters that should correspond to the parameters used in the request with create_dynamic_analysis_report method. The response includes an informative message about the status of the report previously requested.

render.title: A1000 Check Dynamic Analysis Report Status

actions.description: Download previously requested dynamic analysis report in pdf
actions.verbose: Accepts a single hash string and report format parameters that should correspond to the parameters used in the request with create_dynamic_analysis_report method.

actions.description: Get a summary report for hash
actions.verbose: Get a summary report for hash.

retry.description: If set to False there will only be one try at obtaining the analysis report
retry.name: retry

fields.description: List of A1000 report 'fields' to query
fields.name: fields

include_network_threat_intelligence.description: Include network threat intelligence in the summary report
include_network_threat_intelligence.name: include_network_threat_intelligence

skip_reanalysis.description: Skip sample reanalysis when fetching the summary report
skip_reanalysis.name: skip_reanalysis

actions.verbose: Get detailed analysis report for sample.

retry.description: If set to False there will only be one try at obtaining the analysis report
retry.name: retry

fields.description: List of A1000 report 'fields' to query
fields.name: fields

skip_reanalysis.description: Skip sample reanalysis when fetching the summary report
skip_reanalysis.name: skip_reanalysis

actions.verbose: Get classification for one sample. The default value of local_only is False, which, if not changed, will send a request to TitaniumCloud to get the sample. The av_scanners parameter decides if the AV scanner results will be included in the classification report.

local_only.description: Return only local samples without querying TitaniumCloud
local_only.name: local_only
